name: Waking Bones' Abyss
description: A fun, fast-paced platformer with a dark but humorous tone. Race against time to capture wandering souls and use them to revive all the hidden skulls of each level. Each level has a new challenge - spikes, acid, moving platforms, deadly bats! Run, jump, break blocks to release skulls and get coins. And remember: the Devil is always willing to trade some souls in exchange for more time!
